title: Alias
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
An 
Alias
 provides your organisation with an entry point to 
SmartSimple
. For example: 
xyz
.smartsimple.biz – the xyz is the alias. The 
system administrator
 establishes the alias through the 
Global Settings
 page.
 
 Retrieved from ‘
https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Alias&oldid=18185
’
